thread.title: Journalism Legend Calls Anti-Trump Dossier ‘A Garbage Document’
thread.title_full: Journalism Legend Calls Anti-Trump Dossier ‘A Garbage Document’

author: Jack Davis
title: Journalism Legend Calls Anti-Trump Dossier ‘A Garbage Document’
text:
Trump Raises Massive Sum For His Inauguration, Surpasses Records 
Woodward said Trump is justified to be suspicious of the way in which the dossier was released. 
“I think what is under reported here is Trump’s point of view on it. You laid it out when those former CIA people said these things about Trump, that he was a recruited agent of the Russians, and a useful fool, they started this in Trump’s mind,” Woodward said. 
“He knows the old adage, ‘Once a CIA man, always a CIA man.’ No one came out and said, ‘Those people shouldn’t be saying those things.’ So act two is the briefing when this dossier is put out.” 
Woodward said whatever the motivation, the end result was a mistake in the way the dossier was handled. 
“Trump’s right to be upset about that,” Woodward said. 
“I think if you look at the real chronology and the nature of the battle here, those intelligence chiefs who were the best we had, who are terrific and have done great work. I think they made a mistake here. And when people mistakes, they should apologize,” he added. What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
